ShapeDotNet.GIS.ShapefileReader.RenderThread Class Reference

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

 RenderThread (MapMetrics metrics, VectorFeature[] features, ShapeType type, int beginning, int ending, Pen pen, Brush brush)
void Start ()

Detailed Description

This is where the rubber meets the road. RenderThread is given a beginning and ending point in the VectorFeature array and it draws all of the features between those two points to the MapMetrics.Canvas. Of course VectorFeatures that are marked as not being in view are skipped.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

ShapeDotNet.GIS.ShapefileReader.RenderThread.RenderThread (  MapMetrics  metrics,
VectorFeature[]  features,
ShapeType  type,
int  beginning,
int  ending,
Pen  pen,
Brush  brush
) 
 

The constructor for the RenderThread. Sets up the private members of the class, but DOES NOT start the rendering process.

Parameters:
metrics The MapMetrics object for this Map
features The VectorFeature array
type The type of shapefile we're going to draw
beginning The array index of the VectorFeature to begin drawing with
ending The array index of the VectorFeature to end drawing with
pen The pen to draw the features with
brush The brush to fill the features with
